markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Déjà Vu](/Spells.aspx?ID=1986)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=631" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 244 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Bergelmir](/Deities.aspx?ID=491), [Yhidothrus](/Deities.aspx?ID=441)

**Patron Theme**
[Cobyslarni](/Patrons.aspx?ID=23)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 100 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

**Duration** 2 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

You loop a thought process in the target's mind, forcing it to repeat a moment's worth of actions. The target must attempt a Will save. If the target fails, whatever actions the target uses on its next turn, it must repeat on its following turn. The actions must be repeated in the same order and as close to the same specifics as possible. For example, if the target makes an attack, it must repeat the attack against the same creature, if possible, and if the target moves, it must move the same distance and direction, if possible, on its next turn.

 If the target can't repeat an action, such as Casting a Spell that has been exhausted or needing to target a creature that has died, it can act as it chooses for that action but becomes [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94) until the end of its turn.
name: Déjà Vu

</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make a creature do the same thing repeatedly.
</summary>
summary: Make a creature do the same thing repeatedly.
summary_markdown: Make a creature do the same thing repeatedly.
text: Déjà Vu Two Actions Source Player Core 2 pg. 244 1.1 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Bergelmir, Yhidothrus Patron Theme Cobyslarni Range 100 feet Target 1 creature Defense Will Duration 2 rounds --- You loop a thought process in the target's mind, forcing it to repeat a moment's worth of actions. The target must attempt a Will save. If the target fails, whatever actions the target uses on its next turn, it must repeat on its following turn. The actions must be repeated in the same order and as close to the same specifics as possible. For example, if the target makes an attack, it must repeat the attack against the same creature, if possible, and if the target moves, it must move the same distance and direction, if possible, on its next turn. If the target can't repeat an action, such as Casting a Spell that has been exhausted or needing to target a creature that has died, it can act as it chooses for that action but becomes stupefied 1 until the end of its turn.
